titles.title: A resolution to express the gratitude of the Senate for the efforts and achievements of the United States Winter Olympics Team.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 2/29/1988--Introduced. Expresses the support and gratitude of the Senate for the efforts and achievements of the U.S. athletes at the XV Winter Olympics.
